summary: This document is an email chain from May 26, 2020, discussing the creation of video clips from Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition videos for the Epstein investigation. An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York requests specific question-and-answer sequences be extracted and shared.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her deposition videos are the subject of the email chain; clips are being requested from her testimony.

connections.description: C is requesting video clips from Maxwell's deposition as part of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Request for Maxwell deposition video clips
events.description: An email chain coordinates the creation of video clips from Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition videos, specifying approximately 11 Q&A sequences for the Epstein investigation.

locations: Usa.doj.gov\cloud\NYS StAndrews\Shared\USvEpstein-2018801618\Investigation\# 2018 SDNY investigation\Subpoena llett ra202CS, third subpoena response\Videos
keyFacts: Prosecutors were working with deposition videos of Ghislaine Maxwell in May 2020 as part of the Epstein investigation.
Specific question-and-answer sequences from Maxwell's deposition were targeted for clipping, as listed in an attached document.
The video files were stored in a shared DOJ cloud folder related to the 2018 SDNY investigation and a third subpoena response.
The correspondence shows ongoing investigative preparation involving multimedia evidence.
